name: Peko Peko Sushi
summary: "Peko Peko Sushi is a fast-paced conveyor sushi puzzle game. Serve hungry customers by shuffling sushi about, racking up high scores by stacking plates and acting quick. Unlock new staff and store parts to change the way you play and make it your own. Download now and help Ayame build the greatest sushi restaurant of all time!"
